mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainSetting(trainCategory, roomNum, roomGrade, seatRow, seatColumn) VALUES(#{trainCategory}, #{roomNum}, #{roomGrade}, #{seatRow}, #{seatColumn})
mapper.select: SELECT trainCategory, trainRoomCount, trainSeatCount FROM trainCategory
mapper.update: UPDATE trainCategory SET trainSeatCount=#{trainSeatCount} WHERE trainCategory = #{trainCategory}
